result.arabic_text: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
result.translation: 41. Waxaa Calaamo ugu filan inaan ku qaadnay ubadkoodii6 Doonidii buuxday.
result.footnotes: 6. Weedha durriyad halkan waxaa loola jeedaa fir (waa inay yihiin firkii Nuux) ee laga badbaadshay daadkii weynaa ee lagu halaagay qoonkii Nuux.
